function round(value, precision) {
  precision = precision || 0;
 
  value = ('' + value).split('e');
  value = Math.round(+(value[0] + 'e' + (value[1] ? +value[1] + precision : precision)));
 
  value = ('' + value).split('e');
  value = +(value[0] + 'e' + (value[1] ? +value[1] - precision : -precision));
 
  return value.toFixed(precision);
}
